entry.content:
One of my first digital projects was this conference illustration for djangoday.dk I learned a lot during such a short period. I got better at digitizing my work and coloring svgs. There was a lot of communication back and forth via Email, but Django Denmark was such a lovely organization to work together with.

Thank you for the lovely collaboration, for your inspiration and your friendly feedback.
